titles.title: To amend the Poultry Products Inspection Act to cover birds of the order Ratitae that are raised for use as human food.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 10/13/1998--Introduced. Amends the Poultry Products Inspection Act to include within the definition of poultry birds of the order Ratitae (ostriches, emus, rheas) that are raised for commercial distribution as human food.
